actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Banking.

committees.committee: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A bill to amend the Securities Act of 1933, the Securities Exchange Act of 1934, and the Investment Company Act of 1940 to include individual and self-employed retirement plans as exempted securities.

summary.text: Amends the Securities Act of 1933, the Securities Exchange Act of 1934, and the Investment Company Act of 1940 to exempt individual and self-employed retirement plans and their collective investment from regulation under such Acts.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Securities Act of 1933, the Securities Exchange Act of 1934, and the Investment Company Act of 1940 to include individual and self-employed retirement plans as exempted securities.
